item.title: Help with Starting Position / Spawning point
item.dc:creator: @William.D William.D
item.description:
@William.D wrote:

So i followed a tut , This one :

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

But if i login i dont go on that spawning point , This is in my player.java :

[code]
// initial x and y coordinates of the player
heightLevel = 0;
// the first call to updateThisPlayerMovement() will craft the proper initialization packet
teleportToX = 1000;//3072;
teleportToY = 1000;//3312;

	// client initially doesn't know those values yet
	absX = absY = -1;
	mapRegionX = mapRegionY = -1;
	currentX = currentY = 0;
	resetWalkingQueue();

[/code][br][size=1]Posted on: April 10, 2007, 01:27:43 PM[/size][hr]Help please.

Read full topic
